name: Bullford World Limited
description: service provider & trader of a long list
overview:
BULLFORD WORLD LIMITED came into existence as a Public Limited Company in 2005 & is an unit of I.G. Pharma Limited, Roorkee. We have focused all our energies in manufacturing, supplying, trading, wholesaling, distributing and exporting high quality Anti-Biotic, Steroids, Anabolic Steroids, Anti Allergic, Injectables, Analgesic & Anti-Inflammatory, Anti Cold & Cough Syrups, B-complex, Iron Syrups, Ayurvedic and veterinary products and all types of Beta and non beta tablets and caps.

Our Mission: Our mission at Bull Ford World Limited is to provide medicines with total customer satisfaction and achieve leadership in chosen market. Increased awareness and acceptance of favorable legislation provide a solid ground to branded Drugs in the Indian market

Our Infrastructure: Infrastructure at Bull Ford World Limited comprises of following aspects viz., state-of-the-art manufacturing units, warehouses, a winning team, dedicated distributors and distribution network and smart work space.

Clientele: By doing ethical business and adhering to professionalism, we have been able to serve the community at large. Our professionals try their best to accomplish the goals of the organization and benefit the clients in the most appropriate manner. We make sure that along with profitability, productivity is just not compromised.

Our Strengths: State of the art WHO-GMP certified Adherence to all regulatory requirements Highly advanced procurement & supply facility Good knowledge of Indian pharmaceutical marketplace Cost efficiency passed to channel partners & end-consumers Best packaging in the industry On time delivery of consignments
